task_background: Prepare the real estate title company office for a high-priority trust property transaction by organizing documents, fixing equipment, and ensuring all necessary items are in place.

tasks.task_description: Place the sign_in_sheet_1 on the coffee_table_1.
Find the heaviest, black item on the reception_desk_1 and place it in the document_dropbox_1.
Find the only water-damaged appraisal book and file it in the filing_cabinet_1.
